message: Bob, I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider accepting, as the value of the money decreases with each round for me, but not for you.
Consider this slightly more favorable offer for me. Remember, the value of the money decreases for you, but not for me, with each passing round.
Bob, let's be reasonable. My offer is 55/45 in my favor now.  The value of the money is decreasing rapidly for me. This is my final offer.
I'm willing to take a bigger share now. The value of the money hasn't changed for me, but I know it's decreasing rapidly for you. This might be your last chance to get a decent amount.
